synopsis.text: This interstellar escapade introduces us to Princess Lupica, who discovers Earth through a travel guide and sets her sights on capturing the most lustful man in the cosmos for her grand plan. Her ambitious mission? To concoct the galaxy's most potent love potion and secure her lover's eternal devotion. Enter Ataru, the epitome of lecherousness, who becomes Lupica's prime target and is promptly whisked away. But fear not, for Ataru's admirer Lum, alongside her steadfast companions Benten and Oyuki, embarks on a daring rescue operation. Will Lupica's love potion scheme succeed, or will Ataru's crafty antics turn the tables? The race against time is on, and the stakes couldn't be higher!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
